env.description: Environment variables to pass to the Vagrantfile.

get_ports.description: Whether or not to retrieve forwarded port information. See `ports`. Defaults to `false`.

machine_names.description: Names of the vagrant machines from the Vagrantfile. Names are in the same order as ssh_config.

name.description: Name of the Vagrant resource. Forces resource to destroy/recreate if changed. Defaults to `vagrantbox`.

ports.description: Forwarded ports per machine. Only set if `get_ports` is true.

vagrantfile_dir.description: Path to the directory where the Vagrantfile can be found. Defaults to `.`.
